dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: The sun is starting to set...

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Woah! It is! Cool find Margiela!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: It is not that hard to notice Darius. You should be more aware of your surroundings.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Yes Calpico! You’re a smart fella!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Honestly, today was really great! You’re fun to be around ${name}, I hope you’ll be staying around more!

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *Grunts*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Gangus says he thinks you’re cool!

dialogue.speaker: ${name}
dialogue.text: Thank you for helping me out!

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Do you guys smell that? Smells like the rain’s coming

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Uh oh, the sky is getting grey! We need to start finding shelter!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: He’s right, quick ${name}, what do we do?
You look up at the sky and notice the big clouds coming your way. What do you do?

choices.text: Stay out in the rain, staring at the sky.
Panic, get lost, and sleep in an exposed alley.
Curl up in a cozy spot under a tree.
Find the driest, safest, and most structurally sound shelter.
Claim a dry crate and push anyone else out

dialogue.text: *Cashmere purrs, happy that you’re together.*

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Oh, we chose the same spot. Nice to see you again!
*Margiela smirks*

dialogue.speaker: Marigela
dialogue.text: Now that’s how you get what you want.
*Calpico nods, impressed by your logic.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Well Done. You learn fast.
Darius finds you later, relating to your struggle.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: You’ll be okay. Let’s go find the others.
*Gangus, from a distance, respects your discipline and endurance.*

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: I love the rain.
